item.title: Using scraparazzie to search news and send through LINE Notify in Python
item.description: When the idea came up to make the package scraparazzie, the main purpose is to grab news by topics and keywords. Since I don’t really need the news content but title, source and publish date, so that I can receive news with further setting and send the results to an IM bot. That’s why I made scraprazzie. And, yes, mainly for stock market and agriculture news (eh…target in commoditiesðŸ¤«) Somehow I found a tutorial about application in LINE Notify, so let’s do it!
